caption.title: Elevation of histamine production in KSHV+ HIV-infected patients.
caption.p: ( A-B) The histamine concentrations within plasma or saliva from cohort HIV-infected patients were quantified using ELISA. KSHV infection status was identified as described in Methods. *** = p<0.0001. ( C) Proposed schematic representation of histamine related signaling promoting KSHV lytic reactivation, replication as well as viral pathogenesis.
